meanings.sent1: The loud noise was traumatic for the scared puppy.
meanings.sent2: The car accident was traumatic for the passengers involved.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a squirrel wearing sunglasses was so traumatic that it made everyone laugh.

meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by a physical injury or shock
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the traumatic wound carefully.
meanings.sent2: The soldier suffered traumatic injuries during the battle.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a cat wearing a top hat was so traumatic that it made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The news of the sudden company shutdown was as traumatic as a lightning strike.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the broken glass scattered on the floor was a traumatic reminder of the accident.
